name: Arcade Man
description:
A retro game inspired by Atari consoles with a simplistic visual style!

Features:

  • CRT Effect
  • Powerups
  • 8 Bit Graphics
  • 5-Colour Palette
  • Retro SFX and Music

Bonuses:

  • Soundtrack
  • CRT-Less Version
  • Atari-2600 Box Net
  • Source Code
  • Assets
